metadata.title: What Kind of Hostess Are You?
metadata.provenance_note: Paraphrased four-question holiday-hosting quiz with A/B/C outcomes.

preface: Holiday entertaining reveals your inner host energy. Answer four and meet your alter ego.

format.display_instructions: Pick one per question; mostly A/B/C maps to your result.

options.label: A
options.text: No stress—ask a friend to grab something.

options.label: B
options.text: Freezer dive for a passable save.

options.label: C
options.text: Whip up a from-scratch masterpiece, somehow.

options.label: B
options.text: Cute retro apron with a twist.

questions.text: Most important part of the holiday:

scoring.rules: Tally your letters and choose the majority.

outcomes.label: The Communist
outcomes.description: Collaborative, delegation-friendly, and good at keeping the vibe inclusive.

outcomes.label: The Anarchist
outcomes.description: Rules are suggestions. Casual, fun, friends-welcome energy.

outcomes.label: The Dictator
outcomes.description: Perfectionist tableau, breathtaking results—just pace yourself.

scoring.ties: If tied, read both personas; you flex per occasion.
